timeline.bodyText: Syntaxes usable in only some events need annotations to indicate the events they works in.
timeline.author: bensku

replies.bodyText: Do you think this could confuse some users, as the syntax is usable outside of the event? I mean, reading the patterns would probably clear up confusion, but maybe it would be better to specify that the "event-explosion" pattern is only usable in the explosion prime event?
replies.author: APickledWalrus

replies.bodyText: Hmm, true. Maybe it is better to leave it out.
replies.author: bensku

timeline.author: ShaneBeee
ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText: i don't think this is clear - if I did make {_creeper} explode with fire it seems like that effect would actually make the creeper explode immediately which isn't the case
timeline.author: Pikachu920

timeline.bodyText: you can do return ((ExplosionPrimeEvent) e).getFire() ^ isNegated();
timeline.author: Pikachu920
FranKusmiruk

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            				"%entities% [(1¦((does|do) not|(doesn't|don't)))] explode[s] with fire",
          
          
            
            				"%entities% [(1¦((does|do) not|(doesn't|don't)))] cause[s] (a fiery|an incendiary explosion)",
          
          
            
            				"%entities% (is|are) incendiary",
          
          
            
            				"%entities% (is not|are not|isn't|aren't) incendiary",
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk
FranKusmiruk

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            				"make %entities%'[s] explosion [(1¦not)] (fiery|incendiary)",
          
          
            
            				"make %entities% [(1¦not)] cause (a fiery|an incendiary explosion)",
          
          
            
            				"make the [event(-| )]explosion [(1¦not)] fiery");
          
          
            
            				"[(1¦de)]combust [the] (%-entities%|[event(-| )]explosion)",
          
          
            
            				"make %entities% [(1¦not)] incendiary");
          
      
    
    
  

May have to add the null flag to the second pattern if it not having it causes issues.
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk
